items.titolo: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang explains why SRAM isn't here to eat HBM's lunch — high bandwidth memory offers more flexibility in AI deployments across a range of workloads
items.descrizione: At CES, Jensen Huang was pressed on margins, memory costs, and whether Nvidia’s growing use of SRAM and open AI models might finally loosen the company’s grip on expensive HBM.

items.titolo: Nvidia's next-gen RTX 60 series might not debut until the second half of 2027, says leaker — rumor claims Rubin architecture will power future consumer GPUs
items.descrizione: Rumors claim that Nvidia will be launching its next-generation RTX 60 series graphics cards in 2H 2027 and building its next-gen GPUs on the Rubin architecture.
